creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: two dark irregular shaped, high relief, abstract shapes; dark gray/blue glaze with rough texture; part (a) is smaller and is on the L side; part (b) is larger hangs on R side; holes for hanging on back of each piece; arrived with ziplock bag of hardware for hanging
dimension:
22 × 14 1/2 × 6 1/2 in. (55.9 × 36.8 × 16.5 cm) (object part, part a, left side)
19 × 23 1/2 × 5 in. (48.3 × 59.7 × 12.7 cm) (object part, part b, right side)
title: Diptych: Recession (Wall)
